title: @RiotScruffy, can we give Taric the ryze treatment (gameplay before visuals)?
body:
Since you said that his gameplay changes are done and almost locked on but his VU is still far away ( core fantasy still not locked) can you possibly deliver theise gameplay changes and then follow with the VU at a later time?

thanks.

replies.body: Heimendinger have some kind of this treatment, so they can make the same of Taric, but ist better show both (Kit and VU) together.
still i just wanna know how he plays they can turn him into a blob if he plays nice i would still play him because he always looked poop i wont be amazed if he looks rly good either.
exactly!!but him looking good would awsome
having both would be ideal but if it means waiting much more (and i think it's the case) i would gladly just take the gameplay changes
Well Warwick kit showing the 10 April of 2014 (today an exactly year )and never comes out... So its normal wait long time for a good job, because its a lot of work re-launch a champ.
what i heared is that Taric skillset is done but they have problems with his theme/visuals.
exactly so my question is why not give what's ready (like ryze)?
would love to see it too but you know rito can do what the fk they want and if they dont feel like it they will never show us until its done. just give em a year or two soon tm.

pretty sure they have different teams, 1 for visuals and 1 for gameplay and they work simultaneously, whoever gets their shit done first determines what gets released first

godam the visual team doe
I feel so naked as updated ryze
and taric isnt naked for some reason

if they could swap that, that be great
